description: Introducing Lukas Marquez. You won't find too many young men like Lukas... only 19 years old, but handsome, sexy and oh so muscular! In this scene, Lukas performs calisthenics (exercises, in other words), showing off his buff body and flexing those mouth-watering muscles before jumping on the bed to cool off and work out his 'love muscle'. And a mighty love muscle it is... nearly 9 inches of hot, throbbing uncut meat! Lukas strokes it to it's full length, his eyes ablaze with lust, moaning and thrashing about the bed, until he erupts with a hot shower of creamy Lukas-juice.
title: CitiBoyz 20: Youthful Urges, Scene #01
